"Pause doesn't play Rust on stream. Please don't ask."
Pause is currently playing with Rob (Rurikar22) and HCJustin.
Pause plays GTA V on Xbox 360.

Subscribe to get the following emotes! pause Pizza = pausePizza | pause Rage = pauseRage | pause Scared = pauseScared | pause Dealwithit = pauseDealwithit | pause Potato = pausePotato | pause Cupcake = pauseCupcake | pause Dora = pauseDora | pause Cry = pauseCry -- (remove spaces)
